issue_description:
**Which new version of Apache Kafka should we support?**

3.3.1

**Additional information**

https://downloads.apache.org/kafka/3.3.0/RELEASE_NOTES.html
https://downloads.apache.org/kafka/3.3.1/RELEASE_NOTES.html

**Changes required**

Maybe

**Implementation checklist**

- [x] Update the Docker image
- [x] Update documentation to include supported version(s)
- [x] Update operator to support the new version (if needed)
- [x] Update integration tests to test use the new versions (in addition or replacing old versions
- [x] Update examples to use new versions
